column4: how do i connect to my mobile phone (sonyerricson w700i) through bluetooth ?
do a search for bluetooth howto in the forum, there is probably something there
I suggest you look up your modile model in the forum see if there are any instructions

doesn't mean that  linux doesn't support your mobile,  you need to check in the forum or google,  linux users / programmer like to make their own drivers and such for hadware regardless of what the maker says
